item.title: 7x24 Automatically Submit Thousands of Jobs to CSE GPGPU Cluster
item.description: Chinese version available. Background Recently I’ve been working on a machine learning project, so it comes inevitable to do some time-eating finetuning tasks. Obviously, it would be infeasible to tune thousands of combinations of hyperparameters all on my laptop. As a result, I turn to CSE’s GPGPU computing cluster, hoping their TITANs can help. The computational power is great, but meanwhile, it’s also quite underwhelming as they put a very annoying limit for the users â€”
